mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID VALUE , USER_NM NAME FROM user WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_CD = #{s_bizCd}
SELECT CLIENT_CD VALUE , CLIENT_NM NAME FROM tb_ms_client WHERE 1=1 AND BIZ_CD = #{s_bizCd}
SELECT BIZ_CD , USER_ID , CLIENT_CD , ORDR , RMRK , USE_YN , IN_USER_ID , IN_DT , UP_USER_ID , UP_DT FROM tb_sy_user_client WHERE 1=1
